main event: A round, shiny, basketball-sized object was detected on ground radar, along with a cigar-shaped object that appeared to be zigzagging in all directions.
interesting points: The object was described as having a round, bright light the size of a silver dollar all around it.
The cigar-shaped object looked like a star to the naked eye and was red and green in color.
The reporting officer stated that a balloon was tracked in the same position as the object.
Other reports of similar sightings in the area were mentioned.
sighted object: A round, shiny object and a cigar-shaped object
